org.gearvrf.widgetplugin

Class GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.widgetplugin.GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo

  • public class GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo provides way to create GVRWidgetSceneObject meshes quickly.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int[] mBottomRightViewCoords 
      float mBottomRightX 
      float mBottomRightY 
      int[] mTopLeftViewCoords
      Following two variables correspond to top left and bottom right X and Y screen coordinates of parent libGDX GLSurfaceView which the app created from which our GVRWidgetSceneObjects are created, kindly refer @GVRWidgetSceneObject for more info on how these scene objects are created from the view
      float mTopLeftX
      Following four variables correspond to top left and bottom right X and Y world coordinates of GVRWidgetSceneObject, creating a rectangle
      float mTopLeftY 
      float mZ
      Z is constant for easy mesh creation, app can transform widget after creation to play with it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRWidgetSceneObjectMeshInfo(float topLeftX, float topLeftY, float bottomRightX, float bottomRightY, int[] topLeftViewCoords, int[] bottomRightViewCoords) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public float mTopLeftX

        public int[] mTopLeftViewCoords
        Following two variables correspond to top left and bottom right X and Y screen coordinates of parent libGDX GLSurfaceView which the app created from which our GVRWidgetSceneObjects are created, kindly refer @GVRWidgetSceneObject for more info on how these scene objects are created from the view
